entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
